column3: If you do this, please also remove the `-I $srcdir/config` from the build system: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/Makefile.am#L21, used in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/src/Makefile.am#L253
Please squash your commits when they are ready for merge. See  https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#squashing-commits
